name: Gameboy paint deluxe
description:
Like mario paint, but for the gameboy color. There are a total of 16 colors to choose from.

Controls:

select to cycle through the colors, start + select to save the drawing, start + A to load whatever drawing is in memory, start + B to set the start position of a rectangle, B to set the start position of a line, B to draw the line/rectangle, and A to draw a single pixel. The start positions of lines/rectangles are represented by a small cursor.
